column2: You arrive at the abode of the strange old scholar Ibrahim. After some persuasion, he invites you in. Ibrahim says that as he is impressed by your sincerity and desire for knowledge, he can sell you a copy of the book. He tells you to beware, however, as too much intense study of the Necronomicon is said to drive the reader insane...
